unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Boost, Just in Time for Diwali!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a Boost, Just in Time for Diwali!**

unnormalised: Bangalore - Looks like getting ready for that Diwali road trip in your electric ride just got a little easier, folks! IIT Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast-charging tech that could juice up your EV battery in a time shorter than it takes to devour a plate of Hyderabadi biryani.
normalised: Bangalore - Looks like getting ready for that Diwali road trip in your electric ride just got a little easier, folks! Indian Institute of Technology Madras just announced a breakthrough in fast-charging tech that could juice up your electric vehicle battery in a time shorter than it takes to devour a plate of Hyderabadi biryani.

unnormalised: Rumours are circulating that Ather Energy is teaming up with local kirana stores across Tamil Nadu to set up affordable charging points, making those midnight drives to Madurai a bit less range-anxious.
normalised: Rumours are circulating that Ather Energy is teaming up with local kirana stores across Tamil Nadu to set up affordable charging points, making those midnight drives to Madurai a bit less range-anxious.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is reportedly investing Rs. 500 Cr in expanding its charging network along the Mumbai-Pune Expressway. Think about it: stopping for some vada pav and a quick charge? Bliss!
normalised: Meanwhile, Reliance is reportedly investing rupee five hundred crore in expanding its charging network along the Mumbai-Pune Expressway. Think about it: stopping for some vada pav and a quick charge? Bliss!

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! A new charging station opened up near that famous Onam sadhya restaurant on MG Road, Kochi. Talk about killing two birds with one stone!
normalised: But wait, there's more! A new charging station opened up near that famous Onam sadhya restaurant on M G Road, Kochi. Talk about killing two birds with one stone!

unnormalised: Experts predict this surge in charging infrastructure will significantly boost EV adoption, making them a viable option even for those long drives to visit family during festive season. Let's hope this momentum continues!
normalised: Experts predict this surge in charging infrastructure will significantly boost Electric Vehicle adoption, making them a viable option even for those long drives to visit family during festive season. Let's hope this momentum continues!
